answers.answer: The term "neuropathy" is spread over a large area which includes diabetes.
And it is not a precursor for diabetes. If it is in fact diabetic neuropathy you have than you have had unmanaged diabetes for quite a long time. Do get tested.

question: I was told that if I have nueropathy that I either have diabetes or ,I am going to get it. How true is that statement?
title: Precursor for  Diabetes
